```
# Purpose: Permanently delete files from a computer's hard drive

# Syntax: del /F /P /Q [file_name]

# Options:
# /F - Force, do not prompt for confirmation
# /P - Path, specify the path to the file or folder to delete
# /Q - Quiet, do not display progress or confirmation messages

using the `compress` command in Windows:
```
@echo off

:: Get the file path and name of the file to delete
set /p file_path=DOCTYPE<nul
if "%file_path%" == "" goto end

:: Delete the file
compress %file_path% >nul

:: Delete the folder if it exists
del /f /q %file_path%

:end
echo Files deleted successfully
